title: Drawing, "Drawing.  Sketches from Rome.  A. St. Peters and the Vatican Place shown from the northeast.  B, C. View of "Castle St. Angelo, Claude's Villa, St. Peters" from the left bank of the Tiber.", March 18, 1869

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Drawing.  Sketches from Rome.  A. St. Peters and the Vatican Place shown from the northeast.  B, C. View of "Castle St. Angelo, Claude's Villa, St. Peters" from the left bank of the Tiber.", March 18, 1869.
March 18, 1869. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-594-a.
